problem.markdown:
>>Monocropping requires fertilizers because the reduction in biodiversity<< () salinizes the soil through evaporation () makes crops more vulnerable to diseases (x) reduces the nutrients present in the soil () causes habitat fragmentation
[explanation] In reducing biodiversity, monocropping reduces certain nutrients in the soil, and therefore requires fertilizers in order to enhance crop growth. [explanation]
